mstickerlib::database

Trait Database

Source 
pub trait Database {
    // Required methods
    async fn get(&self, hash: &Hash) -> Result<Option<String>>;
    async fn add(&self, hash: Hash, url: String) -> Result<()>;
}
Expand description

Database which stores mappings from hashes to matrix media urls, to avoid duplicate uploads of the same file.

Required Methods§

Source

async fn get(&self, hash: &Hash) -> Result<Option<String>>

Source

async fn add(&self, hash: Hash, url: String) -> Result<()>

Dyn Compatibility§

This trait is not dyn compatible.

In older versions of Rust, dyn compatibility was called "object safety", so this trait is not object safe.
